title: Online PBL (Project-Based Learning) Design Strategies for Geography Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Education on geographic spatial analysis and field survey methodologies optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic GIS functions using mobile devices with 80% accuracy
Learners can create community problem-solving project plans (including spatial analysis) with team members using online collaboration tools
Learners can collect and visualize field survey data by combining smartphone camera functionality with GIS applications

resources: Open-Source Geospatial Datasets for Geography Education (Public Data)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
